Translations.Text: jo misl til-chat ke hai, pet mein khaulta rehta hai
ose pakad lo phir ghasithte hoye beech jahannam tak pahonchaao
phir us ke sar par saqth garam paani ka azaab bahaao
(us se kaha jayega) chakta ja, tu to bada zi izzath aur bade ekraam waala tha
yahi wo cheez hai jis mein tum shak kiya karte thein
beshak (Allah se) darne waale aman chayn ki jageh mein honge
baarik aur dabeez resham ke libaas pehne hoye aamne saamne baithe honge
ye isi tara hai aur hum badi badi aankho waali huro se un ka nikaah kar denge
dil jamyi ke saath wahaa har tarah ke mewo ki farmaayeshe karte honge
wahaa wo mauth chakne ke nahi hai, haan pehli mauth (jo wo mar chuke) unhe Allah ta’ala ne dozakh ki saza se bacha diya
ye sirf tere rab ka fazl hai, yahi hai badi kamyaabi
hum ne is Qur’aan ko teri zabaan mein asaan kar diya ta ke wo nasihath haasil kare
ab tu muntzir reh, ye bhi muntazir hai
